summary: Requiem 1.8 fix that rescales critical damages for vanilla Skyrim, Dawnguard, and Requiem weapons
descriptionHtml:
This mod rescales critical damages for vanilla Skyrim, Dawnguard, and Requiem weapons.  Weapons will now critical hit for 50% of the weapon's base damage applied by the Reqtificator.

Critical hits are essential for players that rely on burst damage to quickly eliminate mobs. E.g. assassins, snipers, two handed weapon barbarians, close combat ranger builds. It did not seem balanced that Volendrung would only critical hit for 12 damage. With the fix, it will now crit for 75 damage.

This issue was noted by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/847294/?]ogerboss[/url] in the Requiem forum: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/709775-requiem/page-3400#entry13775028]post #13775028[/url] and [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/709775-requiem/page-4152#entry18353819]post #18353819[/url].


[u]Compatibility: [/u]
Options are available for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim 2, Guard Dialogue Overhaul, and Unique Uniques. These are full patches for Requiem 1.8.x. You will not need an additional compatibility patch for the listed mods.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Critical Damage.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.


[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Critical Damage.esp after Requiem and any mods that alters vanilla weapons and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Critical Damage.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]: Unofficial Patch Project Team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390/?]Guard Dialogue Overhaul[/url]: [b]Eckss[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/?]Unique Uniques[/url]: [b]InsanitySorrow[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773/?]Audio Overhaul for Skyrim 2[/url]: [b]David Jegutidse[/b]
